name: kaliber-oauth2-server
description: ## Register Application (can just be config)   - client ID (The client_id is a public identifier for apps. Even though it’s public, it’s best that it isn’t guessable by third parties)   - client secret? (The client_secret is a secret known only to the application and the authorization server. It must be sufficiently random to not be guessable)   - callback-url / redirect-url (server should never redirect to any other url)
